Package ch.chnoch.thesis.renderer

Interface Summary
SceneManagerIterator An iterator to traverse scenes.
 

Class Summary
AbstractRenderer This class implements some, but not all of the common tasks of a renderer.
AbstractSceneManager The AbstractSceneManager contains some common tasks and fields of a scene manager.
AbstractTouchHandler The AbstractTouchHandler contains many fields and operations that an OnTouchListener can use.
BasicGLES20Renderer The Class BasicGLES20Renderer.
BasicRenderer The Class BasicRenderer.
BoundingBox A BoundingBox is used for every node that has a shape associated with it.
Camera Stores the specification of a virtual camera.
Frustum Stores the specification of a viewing frustum, or a viewing volume.
GL2DRenderer The Class GL2DRenderer.
GLES11Renderer This is an implementation of a renderer for devices that only support OpenGL ES 1.1.
GLES20Renderer This class handles all of the aspect of drawing a shape to the screen.
GLLight Represents a Light that will be drawn with OpenGL ES 2.0.
GLMaterial Represents a material that will be drawn with OpenGL ES 2.0.
GLShader This class manages an OpenGL shader.
GLTexture This class handles an OpenGL texture.
GLViewer This class extends GLSurfaceView, an important class from the Android framework.
GraphSceneManager This is a possible implementation of how to manage a 3D-scene.
Group A group is an abstract superclass for all the nodes in a GraphSceneManager that do not contain an actual shape but rather a collection of child nodes.
Leaf This is the abstract super class of all the nodes in a graph scene manager that contain an element that needs to be drawn.
Light This class stores the general properties of a light source.
Material This class stores the general properties of a material.
PhysicsGroup The PhysicsGroup class extends the abstract Group class to provide an interface between the actual 3D scene and its interaction with the underlying physics engine.
PhysicsTouchHandler The PhysicsTouchHandler is used to interact with application that have support for a physics engine built in.
Plane The class Plane is used as a user interaction to move objects.
Ray A ray is used to find the object that lies in the 3D-space exactly below the 2D point that is pressed by the user on the screen.
RayShapeIntersection This is a data structure to hold information about whether an intersection between a ray and a shape occured and if yes where the hit point is.
RenderItem A data structure that contains a shape and its transformation.
Shape This class represents a 3D shape.
ShapeNode A ShapeNode is a leaf in the GraphSceneManager.
SimpleSceneManager A simple scene manager is a basic implementation of a SceneManagerInterface.
TouchHandler This is a basic touch handler that is used for interacting with scenes that don't have support for a physics engine.
Trackball A Trackball is used to intuitively rotate an arbitrary object in the world.
TransformGroup A TransformGroup is a Group that has a transformation stored.
VertexBuffers This class contains information about the properties of a Shape.
VertexData This class is only used for the import of data from an .obj files.
WorldTrackball A WorldTrackball is used to rotate the camera.
 

Enum Summary
AbstractTouchHandler.CameraMode The different camera modes.
Light.Type Enumeration of the different types of light sources.
VertexData.Semantic Vertex data semantic can be position, normal, or texture coordinates.
 

Exception Summary
GLException The Class represents an exception that occurred during any interaction with OpenGL
